TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TempFileCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable
Public Class TempFileCollection Implements ICollection, IDisposable
public ref class TempFileCollection : IDisposable, System::Collections::ICollection
type TempFileCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示临时文件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of temporary files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用来生成唯一文件名和跟踪的文件的列表。 can be used to generate unique file names and to keep track of a list of files. 这会很有用到实施者管理的编译器生成中间文件，有时会删除在使用后的列表时。This can be useful to implementers when managing a list of compiler-generated intermediate files, which are sometimes deleted after use. 若要指定一个目录来生成唯一的临时文件中的名称，请使用适当地重载的构造函数。To specify a directory to generate unique temporary file names in, use an appropriately overloaded constructor. 此外可以使用构造函数重载以指示是否添加到集合中的文件应，如果不使用时指定，否则或方法，当释放集合时，删除或调用方法。You can also use a constructor overload to indicate whether files added to the collection should, if not specified otherwise when using the or methods, be deleted when the collection is disposed or the method is called. 在任何目录中的文件可以添加到的实例使用方法。A file in any directory can be added to an instance of using the method. 若要生成的特定文件扩展名的临时文件的唯一名称，请调用并指定要生成的文件名称的扩展。To generate a unique name for a temporary file of a particular file extension, call and specify the extension of the file name to generate. 方法将返回一个包含指定的目录中的指定扩展的文件名称的完整路径的字符串属性。The method will return a string consisting of a full path to a file name of the specified extension in the directory specified by the property. 方法将只返回每个文件扩展名的一个唯一的文件名称。The method will only return one unique file name per file name extension. 同时并方法的重载，可以指定当释放集合时是否应删除的文件或调用方法。Both the and methods have overloads that allow you to specify whether the files should be deleted when the collection is disposed or the method is called. 方法将删除除标记为要保留在集合中的所有文件。The method will delete all the files in the collection except those that are marked to be kept. 属性指示基本文件名称，不带文件扩展名，用于生成返回的文件名称的完整路径方法。The property indicates a full path to the base file name, without a file name extension, used to generate the file names returned by the method. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含一个链接要求和继承要求在类级别应用于所有成员。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 一个直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类和和方法。The following example shows the use of the class and the and methods. summary.span: 使用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是默认构造函数初始化具有默认设置的集合。This is a default constructor that initializes the collection with default settings. 默认情况下，此临时文件集合会将文件存储在默认临时目录，并且已生成并使用后将删除临时文件。By default, this temporary files collection will store the files in a default temporary directory and will delete the temporary files after they have been generated and used.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified temporary directory that is set to delete the temporary files after their generation and use, by default.

Public Sub New (tempDir As String, keepFiles As Boolean)

span.span: A path to the temporary directory to use for storing the temporary files.

param.name: keepFiles
param.span: 如果使用临时文件后应保留它们，则为 ；如果应删除临时文件，则为 。

span.span: if the temporary files should be kept after use; if the temporary files should be deleted.

summary.span: 使用指定的临时目录和指定的值初始化 类的新实例，该值指示默认情况下生成并使用临时文件后是保留这些文件还是将它们删除。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified temporary directory and specified value indicating whether to keep or delete the temporary files after their generation and use, by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`keepFiles`用于设置参数。The value of `keepFiles` is used to set the parameter. 集合中的临时文件是保留还是删除编译器活动值的基础完成后集合中的属性。The temporary files in the collection are retained or deleted upon the completion of compiler activity based on the value of the property in the collection. 因为每个文件添加到集合的当前值是与它关联，除非添加与具有的方法，否则`keepFile`参数，在这种情况下，值用于特定文件中的。As each file is added to the collection, the current value of is associated with it, unless it is added with a method that has a `keepFile` parameter, in which case that value is used for that specific file. 当调用方法时，如果是`true`，删除所有文件，包括那些与添加的值`true`。When the method is called, if is `true`, all files are deleted, including those added with a value of `true`. 这允许标识为保留的文件，若要暂时保留为目的，例如错误报告，在编译后则不再需要时删除的那些特定文件。This allows specific files, those identified as being keep files, to be temporarily retained after compilation for purposes such as error reporting, then deleted when they are no longer needed.

span.span: Adds a file name with the specified file name extension to the collection.

span.span: A file name with the specified extension that was just added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回具有指定的扩展已添加到临时文件集合的文件名。This method returns a file name with the specified extension that has been added to the temporary files collection. 其他代码仍必须创建文件，然后才能使用。Other code must still create the file before it can be used. 此方法可以一次调用，每个文件扩展名，因为它将返回相同的名称，如果调用使用相同的扩展名。This method can be called only once for each file name extension, because it will return the same name if it is called with the same extension.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Delete() cil managed

summary.span: 删除此集合中没有标记为保留的临时文件。

span.span: Deletes the temporary files within this collection that were not marked to be kept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将检查以确定是否应保留还是删除该文件，逐个，集合中的每个文件。The method examines each file in the collection to determine, on an individual basis, whether the file is to be kept or deleted. 可以显式标记为文件添加到集合使用添加需要的方法时保持`keepFile`参数。Files can be explicitly marked to be kept when added to the collection using add methods that take a `keepFile` parameter. 将文件添加到集合使用时但没有重载`keepFile`参数的值的属性用作默认保持文件指示符。When adding a file to the collection using the overload that does not have a `keepFile` parameter the value of the property is used as the default keep file indicator.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
Implementing a Dispose method
Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在垃圾回收收回此对象之前尝试删除这些临时文件。

span.span: Attempts to delete the temporary files before this object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写并通过调用清除资源`Dispose(false)`。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 重写 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自定义清理。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法将自动调用垃圾回收期间除非终止由垃圾回收器已禁用通过调用方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示默认情况下在调用 方法或释放集合时是否保留这些文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to keep the files, by default, when the method is called or the collection is disposed.

value.span: 如果应保留文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the files should be kept; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性将用作默认值时重载，但没有`keepFile`参数调用以将临时文件添加到集合。The value of the property is used as the default value when the overload that does not have a `keepFile` parameter is called to add a temporary file to the collection. 集合中的每个临时文件具有关联的文件保留标志，用于确定是否应保留还是删除该文件，按每个文件。Each temporary file in the collection has an associated keep file flag that determines, on a per-file basis, whether that file is to be kept or deleted. 自动保存或基于其关联的保留文件值在编译完成后删除文件。Files are automatically kept or deleted on completion of the compilation based on their associated keep files value. 但是，编译完成后，已保存的文件可以释放通过设置为 false 并调用方法。However, after compilation is complete, files that were kept can be released by setting false and calling the method. 这将导致删除所有文件。This will result in all files being deleted.
